pullRequest.title: Do not restart on internal redeploy if only action is from restartOnDeploy
pullRequest.bodyText:
This is a bit messy because for some reason we repackage List<ConfigChangeAction> into RestartActions and RefeedActions, and they do not even share common super class/interface...
Since this has changes in config-model, I guess we cant roll this out fully until all the apps are past 7.293+

commit.message: Support ignoring actions for internal redeploy
